name: Oat and Blueberry Muffins
author: Melissa Shafer
summary: Quick and easy for on-the-go breakfasts. Low-fat, protein, whole grains, and fiber packed in a muffin!
ingredients: 1 cup instant whole-grain hot cereal (such as Coach's Oats®)
½ cup non-fat vanilla-flavored Greek-style yogurt
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray 12 muffin cups with cooking spray or use paper liners
Mix flour, oats, baking powder, and cinnamon together in a bowl
Stir sugar, applesauce, yogurt, egg, and vanilla extract together in a separate bowl
Stir flour mixture into applesauce mixture until just combined
Fill prepared muffin cups 2/3 full with batter
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean, about 15 minutes
